TopicTitle: Beautiful view of the Kafrican Alps.

Articles.Content:
Picture taken from a hill just southwest of KSC in the late afternoon/early evening from an elevation of approximately 450 meters ASL. The main massifs of the mountains (only the eastern side of the Kafrican Alps is such a narrow transistion between the coastal lowland and the mountains; the mountains terminate as large foothills in a large area to the west). Proves the fact that you don't have to go far to find beautiful views. Enjoy!

 

Tell me if you like it. If yes, I will post more pictures of beautiful landscapes on Kerbin and other planets.
